translation.ja: 〝１９０５年の グリーンランド〞 〝ピアリーランド〞
アイバー 一緒に確認してこい

translation.en: Go see what it is, quickly. Hand me the lantern.
translation.ja: アイバー 一緒に確認してこい ランタンを

translation.en: It's the captain! It's the captain!
-Help Jørgensen. His feet are frozen. -[man 2] Right, come on.
translation.ja: ヨルゲンセンの足が凍った 行こう

translation.en: -[man 3] Holm's on his way. -[man 1] Quick, Unger. Get the water.
translation.ja: ホルムが来る 急いで水を

translation.en: -Unger, hurry up with the water. -It's coming!
translation.ja: ウンガー 水を 今 行く

translation.en: -[man 4] Raise it. Easy. -[man 1] It's all right. We got you.
translation.ja: 頭を上げて 心配するな

translation.en: -We got you. -[man 4] Take it easy, Jørgensen.
translation.ja: 心配するな 大丈夫だぞ

translation.en: [man 4] Hold these. Take it easy, Jørgensen.
-Do you have some whiskey? -[man 1] Yes. Get the man a drink.
translation.ja: 酒はあるか ああ　持ってくる
ヨルゲンセン 呼吸して
１９０９年 クリスマスイブ グリーンランド北東

translation.en: -It's about time we found a use for you. -[laughter]
translation.ja: 褒めてやる どうも うまい

translation.en: [Ejnar] Gentlemen, can I have your attention?

translation.ja: 宴(うたげ)は終わり 黙れよ

translation.en: -I want you all to raise your glasses… -[crew] Of course.
translation.ja: 全員グラスを持って はい

translation.en: to the men who gave their lives exploring the last unknown parts of our kingdom.
translation.ja: 命をかけて未知の土地を 探検した男たちに

translation.en: And to you, for joining me in fulfilling their mission.
translation.ja: 任務に参加してくれた みんなに

translation.en: Our long search didn't go quite as planned. -Jørgensen can testify to that. -[quiet chuckles]
translation.ja: 捜索は困難を極めた ヨルゲンセンが知ってる

translation.en: As expected, it was hard to trace any signs of the vanished expedition.
translation.ja: 遠征隊の痕跡を 見つけるのは難しかった

translation.en: A diary from one of the men.
that apparently shows the location of the cairn
translation.ja: ケルンの場所が記されている

translation.en: where Mylius-Erichsen left his final records of the unknown land.
translation.ja: ミリアス-エリクセンが 記録を残してる

translation.en: A cairn's a stack of stones you can see from far away.
translation.ja: 遠くからでも見える石の山

translation.en: So, therefore, I'll attempt another journey.
translation.ja: そこで もう一度捜索に行く

translation.en: Well, this time further, across the ice cap, to retrieve the findings they left behind.
translation.ja: 今回は氷帽の奥まで行って 残された記録を回収する

translation.en: This is why we're here, boys.
Without these findings, the North of Greenland could be lost, claimed by the Americans.
translation.ja: そうしないとアメリカに グリーンランドを奪われる
ヨルゲンセンは負傷した

translation.en: and I can't do it alone,
which provides one of you lucky boys with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
translation.ja: 君たちの中の１人が 人生に一度の機会を得られる

translation.en: I'll need a volunteer to accompany me.
translation.ja: 私に同行する者を募る

translation.en: [Poulsen] Aren't you next in line, Laub?
Shut up, Poulsen. Some of us have family.
translation.ja: 黙れ　家族がいるんだ

translation.en: Why don't any of you want to go with him?
You saw the map. It's like walking from Moscow to Rome looking for a stack of stones.
translation.ja: モスクワからローマまで 歩いて石山を捜すのと同じ

translation.en: [Poulsen] Not to mention doing it with the captain.
Iver knows him all right. He knew all about him before he came aboard, right?
translation.ja: アイバーは乗船前から 隊長を知ってるんだよな

translation.en: I mean, I've read about him,
[scoffs] Not everyone's a fan, Iver Iversen.
-Not everyone can read. Right, Unger? -Try reading this!
translation.ja: 読めないヤツもいる うるさい

translation.en: I don't know how many volunteers you've had already--
translation.ja: 何人 立候補したか…

translation.en: [clears throat] What I'm trying to say is technically, I'm out of a job.
translation.ja: 何て言うか… 今は仕事がないんです

translation.en: As long as we're parked up here, the motor won't be needed.
translation.ja: ここに留まるなら 機械は必要ない

translation.en: I'd like to come with you, if you'd allow me.
translation.ja: よければ捜索に 同行したいです

translation.en: I'm good with a rifle, and I'm learning how to drive the dogs.
translation.ja: 射撃は得意だし 犬の扱いは練習してる

translation.en: I'd really like to come, Captain.
I'll keep that in mind. Thank you, Iversen.
translation.ja: 考えておく　ありがとう

translation.en: [Laub] Poulsen, hand me those harnesses. -What's Iversen up to? -[Iver] Come on.
translation.ja: ハーネスを貸して アイバーは何してる？

translation.en: -Looks like he needs a hand. -[Iver] Stay there.
translation.ja: 手伝ってやれ 待て

translation.en: All of you stay here, okay?

translation.ja: おい 待て　そこにいろ

translation.en: Here, let me give you a hand.
Iversen, the dogs work for you.
translation.ja: アイバーソン 犬は道具だ

translation.en: Out on the ice, each dog can pull a hundred pounds of weight from the start.
translation.ja: 氷の上で犬は 45kgの荷物を引ける

translation.en: Once that hundred pounds has been eaten, well, that dog becomes surplus to requirement.
translation.ja: 45kgの食料を食べ終えると 犬は余ってしまう

translation.en: So we shoot the worst dog, feed it to the others.
translation.ja: そこで最弱の犬を撃って 他の犬の餌にする

translation.en: So, Iversen, don't become best friends.
translation.ja: だから犬と仲良くするな
アイバーソンが応募した

translation.en: -[Laub] I have, sir. -What are your thoughts on him?
translation.ja: 聞きました どう思う？

translation.en: He's a good lad. -Very brave. -Mm. Strong character.
translation.ja: いい青年です 勇敢で芯が強い

translation.en: Have you seen him with the dogs?
Clearly he needs to work a bit harder to improve.
translation.ja: もっと訓練が必要です

translation.en: But you think he can do it?
[Unger] Don't be ridiculous. Surely that's too heavy.
translation.ja: バカ言うな 〝タイタニック〞 重すぎるよ

translation.en: It's got combination turbines and reciprocating engines
translation.ja: 複合型タービンと 往復機関があって

translation.en: guaranteed to maintain a speed of 21 knots.
translation.ja: 21ノットの速度を維持できる

translation.en: -Translation, anyone, please? -[man 1] What are you talking about?
translation.ja: 意味不明だよ 何の話だ？

translation.en: [Laub] Is the Alabama not up to your standard?
Go on about this with the captain, he'll put a bullet in your head.
translation.ja: 隊長にこんな話したら 頭をぶち抜かれる

translation.en: Yeah, usually I'd say Poulsen's talking shit, but I've gotta agree, I daren't say two words to him.
translation.ja: 大げさに思うだろうが 俺も隊長には話しかけない

translation.en: I have to say, Iver, I think you've lost your mind.
translation.ja: アイバー お前は頭が変だ

translation.en: What do you know about sledging, surviving on the ice when it's 40 below?
translation.ja: 氷点下40度を 犬ぞりで生き残れるのか

translation.en: Yeah, and polar bears and all that other scary shit out there.
translation.ja: ホッキョクグマもいる

translation.en: I think Iver has got quite the handle on those dogs now.
translation.ja: アイバーは犬の扱いが 上達した

translation.en: It's not too late to change your mind.
This is my third trip up here and I still hate those fucking dogs.
translation.ja: ３度目の旅だが 今でも犬が大嫌い

translation.en: If they were any more inbred, they'd be sandwiches.
translation.ja: パンで犬サンドを作る？

translation.en: Once you learn to trust your lead dog, it kind of falls into place.
translation.ja: 先導犬を信用すれば 万事うまくいく

translation.en: Mine's Bjørn. He keeps the others in check. He does all the work.
translation.ja: 僕のはビョーン 彼が全部やってくれる

translation.en: Check out Iver and his new favorite dog, Bjørn!
translation.ja: ビョーンがお気に入りか

translation.en: I feel like I've let you down.
You need to get yourself right.

translation.ja: アイバーソンが立候補した

translation.en: He wouldn't even be on this trip if our engine hadn't failed in Reykjavik.
translation.ja: エンジンが故障しなければ 来なかった

translation.en: Just look after Alabama for me.
You're not a young man anymore.
You're risking your life, Iversen's life.
translation.ja: 自分の命と アイバーソンの命を…

translation.en: You want us to give up without trying?
Do you expect her to wait for you?
-You've got nothing to prove. -This is not about me.
translation.ja: 行く必要はない 私の問題ではない

translation.en: The sea opens up by July. If we're not back by August before the sea freezes, then you go.
translation.ja: ７月には海氷が解ける ８月までに戻らなければ帰れ

translation.en: -You'll basically be on your own. -That's an order.
Iversen is the best, if not the only, man willing to make the trip.
translation.ja: 志願してくれた アイバーソンに賭ける

translation.en: I respect your concern, but we are leaving tomorrow.
translation.ja: 心配はありがたいが 明日出発する

translation.en: [Laub] Iver, stand closer to the captain.
translation.ja: アイバー 隊長に寄って

translation.en: Thank you. I'll see you in August.
-[Poulsen] You too, Captain. -[Unger] All the best.

translation.ja: どうも ヨルゲンセン

translation.en: -Are we gonna try and get up there? -Well, there's always a way up.
translation.ja: これを登る？ もちろん登るが 最短のルートを探さないと

translation.en: It's just finding the quickest route.
translation.ja: もちろん登るが 最短のルートを探さないと

translation.en: I bet there's a quick way down too.
Mm, which is why I need you to concentrate at all times.
translation.ja: だからこそ常に集中しろ

translation.en: We need to get up to get across.
It's like we've landed on the moon.
How many cubic meters of ice do you think this is?
translation.ja: 何立方メートルの氷かな？

translation.en: Must be at least two million, do you think?
I need you to watch where you're walking.
[Iver] I'm reading this article you wrote about the Denmark Expedition.
translation.ja: 隊長のデンマーク遠征の 記事を読んでます

translation.en: Now I'm here with you, reading your story.
translation.ja: 隊長の前で隊長の記事を読む
興味深い 〝ミリアスと探検車〞

translation.en: They had so much equipment, didn't they? They even had an automobile.
translation.ja: 〝ミリアスと探検車〞 装備が充実してた　車まで 装備が充実してた　車まで

translation.en: Imagine that! Driving across the ice.
translation.ja: 氷上を運転するなんて

translation.en: What type do you think it was, Captain?
What horsepower was the engine? Can you remember?
translation.ja: エンジンの馬力を 覚えてますか

translation.en: Was it four to eight perhaps?
Captain, that's my lead dog, Bjørn.
translation.ja: 僕の先導犬ビョーンです

translation.en: I think he'd like to come in the tent. Would that be okay?
translation.ja: テントに入りたがってる いいですか

translation.en: Little wonder they got lost out here.
what do you think really happened to the Denmark Expedition?
translation.ja: デンマーク遠征で 何が起きたと思いますか

translation.en: Sometimes, it's best not to think too much.
But he never knew when to give up.
The two others were lost in the ice.
[Iver] Imagine dying like that. Alone in this place.
translation.ja: 独りぼっちで そんな死に方するなんて

translation.en: [Ejnar] His final words in the diary and the map were all that survived.
translation.ja: 日記と地図だけが救出された

translation.en: You never think you can't make it.
You always believe there'll be a way.
translation.ja: 道は開けると信じてる

translation.en: Captain told us we can't have you in if you make noise.
translation.ja: お前は鳴くから 中に入れたらダメだって

translation.en: Captain, I've just put that on.
Well, let me show you something.
translation.ja: いいものを見せてやる

translation.en: In Alaska, they do this in these conditions to go fast.
translation.ja: アラスカでは道を急ぐ時 こうする

translation.en: Just a thin layer of ice.

translation.ja: アイバーソン 北の巻雲が見えるか

translation.en: -See the cirrus clouds up in the north? -No, Captain.
translation.ja: アイバーソン 北の巻雲が見えるか いえ　見えるのは太陽だけ
いえ　見えるのは太陽だけ

translation.en: The dogs are smelling land! Slow down!
translation.ja: 土の匂いだ　速度を落とせ

translation.en: I can see him! It's Bjørn.
Get up! We'll pull the sledge up.
translation.ja: 来い　そりを引くぞ

translation.en: I've lost us two weeks' worth of dog food,
I've lost us half our tea and one can of paraffin.
translation.ja: お茶の半量 燃料を１缶 失いました

translation.en: -And Bjørn, Captain. -It's just a dog, Iversen.
translation.ja: ビョーンも ただの犬だ

translation.en: Bringing you with me was always a risk,
translation.ja: 君と旅をするリスクは 承知してたが

translation.en: but I judged your Navy background would arm you with the necessary discipline
translation.ja: 君と旅をするリスクは 承知してたが 海軍にいたから 命令には従うと思ってた
海軍にいたから 命令には従うと思ってた

translation.en: [sighs] Well, at least tomorrow, we'll be off the ice cap.
translation.ja: 明日には氷帽を抜ける

translation.en: can I ask you a personal question?
Keep doing this, out here, in places like this?
translation.ja: こんな場所で 探検を続けるのですか

translation.en: Pretty much alone, risking your life.
Don't you have someone special at home waiting for you?
translation.ja: 待っている人は いないのですか

translation.en: You can't have your mind some 2,000 miles away.
translation.ja: 遠くに思いを はせていられない

translation.en: So, why do you do this?
Why does anyone do anything? Why are you a mechanic?
translation.ja: 君は なぜ整備士なんだ？

translation.en: It's all I was good at, fixing engines.
translation.ja: エンジンの修理が得意だから

translation.en: What did they tell you back when you joined us in Reykjavik?
translation.ja: 遠征に途中参加する時 何て言われた？

translation.en: Well, I know it's to do with the Americans and their claim of some land.
translation.ja: アメリカ人が土地の権利を 主張していると
でも僕は隊長と グリーンランド遠征に

translation.en: I was just excited to go on a trip to Greenland with you
translation.ja: でも僕は隊長と グリーンランド遠征に 参加できることが うれしかった
参加できることが うれしかった
グリーンランド北部は 海峡で別れてると

translation.en: that the top of Greenland is separated by a channel
translation.ja: グリーンランド北部は 海峡で別れてると アメリカ人は主張してる

translation.en: from the rest of the country,
translation.ja: アメリカ人は主張してる

translation.en: but no one's proved it yet.
Might even make you famous, Iversen.
translation.ja: 君も有名になれるかも

translation.en: Me, famous? I doubt the ladies would be queuing up for me.
translation.ja: 僕が？　女性にモテるかな

translation.en: Well, don't get ahead of yourself.
translation.ja: 喜ぶのは まだ早い

translation.en: First, we have to find the bloody thing.
-I call her Miss Affection. -You named her?
-Miss Affection. -What sort of name is that?
translation.ja: “愛情さん” 変な名前だな

translation.en: -[Ejnar] What about this one? -The small, smiley one?
translation.ja: これは？ 小柄な笑顔の子？

translation.en: -She'd laugh at my jokes. -She'd laugh at the stupid name.
translation.ja: 僕の冗談に笑う 変な名前を笑った

translation.en: Is there one that catches your eye, Captain?
[Ejnar] I rather like this one. Has she got a name?
translation.ja: この子がいいな 名前はある？

translation.en: [Ejnar] I'm going to call her Naja.
translation.ja: ナヤと呼ぶことにする

translation.en: Unless any man here should know of any impediment,
translation.ja: 異議を申し立てる者が いなければ―

translation.en: you and Naja shall be together from this day on.
translation.ja: 隊長とナヤの結婚を認めます

translation.en: No life here. I didn't even see a bird.
translation.ja: 生き物はいない　鳥さえ

translation.en: -I've not done anything. -You must've done something.
translation.ja: 僕は何も 君のせいで もう使えない

translation.en: It's not working anymore. Are you a complete idiot?
translation.ja: 君のせいで もう使えない 何てバカなんだ
これがないと困る 僕は…

translation.en: Without the Primus, we're as good as dead, understand?
translation.ja: コンロがないと死ぬ 分かってるのか

translation.en: -You do understand that? -Can you pass the kettle, Captain?
translation.ja: コンロがないと死ぬ 分かってるのか やかんを取って

translation.en: We'll have to go half ration from now on.
Now, we have a slight course correction we need to make.
translation.ja: これから少し― コースを変更する

translation.en: Is there a point where perhaps we…

translation.ja: 認め… 負けを認める？

translation.en: We have a map. We will find it. We won't find it by standing around talking.
translation.ja: 地図があれば探せる 話してても見つからない

translation.en: And we will be back on the Alabama by August.
translation.ja: ８月までにアラバマ号に戻る

translation.en: We're going down to one sledge.

translation.ja: 彼らは ここにいた

translation.en: They were here, Captain! This is a camp.
translation.ja: 彼らは ここで野営してた

translation.en: "Being without food for ourselves and our dogs,
translation.ja: “食料が尽きるため 海岸に向けて出発する”

translation.en: we must leave this place and try to make our way to coastal areas with game,
translation.ja: “食料が尽きるため 海岸に向けて出発する” “食料が尽きるため 海岸に向けて出発する” 〝ピアリーランド〞 〝ピアリーランド〞 〝ピアリーランド〞 “船まで930kmの道のりを 賄う狩猟肉がある”

translation.en: enough to sledge the 580 miles back to the ship."
translation.ja: “船まで930kmの道のりを 賄う狩猟肉がある”

translation.en: They had no food, Captain, but they left this.
translation.ja: 食料が不足してたのに 残してくれた

translation.en: "We discovered and leave a proof in this cairn that Peary Channel does not exist."
translation.ja: “ピアリー海峡が存在しない 証拠をケルンに残す”

translation.en: "Navy Cliff is joined by land to Heilprin Land,
translation.ja: “ネイビークリフは” “ハイルプリンランドと 陸続き”

translation.en: therefore our work is almost done."
translation.ja: “ハイルプリンランドと 陸続き”

translation.en: "We hope to reach the ship before the end of September, with or without dogs."
translation.ja: “９月までには 船に戻りたい”

translation.en: "Lieutenant Mylius-Erichsen, leader of Denmark Expedition to Northeast Greenland."
translation.ja: “デンマーク遠征リーダー ミリアス-エリクセン中尉”

translation.en: Robert Peary and the Americans were wrong. This is it.
translation.ja: ロバート･ピアリーと アメリカ人は間違ってた

translation.en: I don't really understand why what we found is so important,
translation.ja: 見つけた物の価値は 分からないけど―

translation.en: but seeing you smile, Captain, seeing you laugh…
translation.ja: 隊長が笑顔で喜んでる

translation.en: Greenland is one. The USA has no claim here.
translation.ja: グリーンランドは１つ アメリカに権利はない

translation.en: Denmark will thank you one day, Iver Iversen.
translation.ja: デンマークに感謝されるぞ

translation.en: It's time to celebrate. Now you put that soup on.
translation.ja: 祝おう　スープの用意を

translation.en: We can go home now, Iversen.
Like walking from Rome to Moscow looking for a stack of stones.
translation.ja: “モスクワからローマまで 歩いて石山を捜す”

translation.en: That's what the guys were saying on the ship.
translation.ja: 船のみんなが言ってた

translation.en: Well, you can put them straight now.
Do you think we could eat the liver?
The rest is skin and bone.

translation.ja: だが 何だったかな…

translation.en: about a silver spoon in a pot with anything poisonous?
translation.ja: 銀のスプーンで 毒を判別できる？

translation.en: Shame we don't have any silver.
You said you didn't have anyone back home.
-I don't remember. -No, I don't remember either.
translation.ja: 覚えてない 僕も覚えてません

translation.en: -That's… not green. -That's more brown than green.
translation.ja: これは… 緑ではない 茶色っぽいな

translation.en: You're okay. You're okay! I've got it.
translation.ja: もう大丈夫　心配ない

translation.en: I can't believe this was the only thing that got torn.
translation.ja: 破れたのが これだけなんて奇跡だ
一緒にいるだけでいい

translation.en: [sighs] They're different, aren't they? Their voices, their smell.
translation.ja: 女性は声とか匂いが男と違う

translation.en: I remember when I was 16, about to join the Navy,
translation.ja: 僕が16歳の時 海軍に入る前―

translation.en: my grandfather asked if I'd go with him to Copenhagen Harbor.
translation.ja: 祖父にコペンハーゲン港に 行こうと誘われた

translation.en: I thought we were going to look at ships, so I went along,
translation.ja: 船を見るのかと思った

translation.en: even packing a lunch for the two of us,
He wanted to make sure I was ready to set sail and, in his words, "be a man."
translation.ja: “男になって”海軍に 入れるよう計らってくれた

translation.en: So he took me to the red-light district to introduce me to women,
translation.ja: 僕を売春街に連れて行った

translation.en: make sure I wasn't embarrassed on my travels.
translation.ja: 海軍で恥をかかないよう

translation.en: [chuckles] I just went along with it.
Ended up with this older woman.
translation.ja: 年上の女性をあてがわれた

translation.en: I must admit, she did expand my knowledge greatly.
translation.ja: その女性が 僕の知識を広げてくれた

translation.en: When I was 16, my dad took me to the hospital,
translation.ja: 16歳の時 父に病院に連れて行かれた

translation.en: to show me the dire consequences of such behavior.
translation.ja: そういう行為の 悲惨な結果を見せるため
隊長 やめてください

translation.en: We have to travel light if we're gonna make it.
translation.ja: 生き残るため身軽になる

translation.en: We'll leave everything that's not absolutely vital.
translation.ja: 必要最低限の物以外 処分する

translation.en: There's another 200 miles to the ship.
-Why can't we go around? -We won't have time.
translation.ja: う回は？ 時間がない

translation.en: We need to build a cairn.
You don't think we can make it, do you?
If we don't, we lose everything.
translation.ja: そうなれば すべてを失う

translation.en: [Ejnar] At least if the proof and our journals are kept here in a cairn, they can be found.
translation.ja: ケルンに証拠と日記を残せば いつか発見される
アイバーソン 大丈夫だ

translation.en: This is what happened to Mylius-Erichsen, isn't it?
translation.ja: ミリアス-エリクセンと 同じ運命？

translation.en: I just need to lie down for a second.
[Iver] Sound the bell! -[Ejnar laughs] -Sound the bell!
translation.ja: ベルを鳴らせ　ベルを鳴らせ

translation.en: They've built a hut with parts of the ship.
translation.ja: 船を使って小屋を作ってる

translation.en: No, they've left us! They've left us!
translation.ja: 彼らに置き去りにされた
ひどい！　何てことだ！

translation.en: The Alabama was wrecked, crushed by the ice.
translation.ja: アラバマ号は氷が衝突して 大破した

translation.en: We had to leave when we had the chance.
translation.ja: 帰れる時に戻るしかなかった

translation.en: We left enough food to last at least a year.
-[official] Let's pray they make it back. -They want more than prayers.
translation.ja: 無事を祈ろう 祈りだけでは足りない

translation.en: You're asking the government to fund another rescue attempt. Is that correct?
translation.ja: また政府に救助隊の資金を 出せと？

translation.en: Lieutenant Laub, it's not your first visit to the Arctic, is it?
translation.ja: ラウブ中尉 北極は初めてではないだろ

translation.en: No, sir. It was my fourth.
And who is this man, Iver Iversen?
translation.ja: アイバー･アイバーソンは 何物だ？

translation.en: His name is not on the original crew list.
translation.ja: 元の乗組員リストにない

translation.en: [official] No. He joined Alabama in Reykjavik.
translation.ja: レイキャビクで乗船しました

translation.en: And how come a mechanic is chosen to accompany Mikkelsen on the second sled journey?
translation.ja: なぜ整備士がミケルセンの ２度目のそり旅に同行した？

translation.en: Did he have any experience as an Arctic explorer?
This was his first time in the Arctic.
So, three dead men the first time around and now two more on the rescue attempt.
translation.ja: 最初は３人が死んで 次は２人の死人を救出？

translation.en: Sir, there's no proof that they're--
[scoffs] Proof! Nobody brings home any proof.
translation.ja: 証拠だと？ 誰も証拠を持ち帰らない

translation.en: Now, you two both knew that the chances of success were minimal.
translation.ja: 成功の可能性は低いと 知ってた

translation.en: Even less so when you allow an inexperienced greenhorn to volunteer for an early death.
translation.ja: 経験のない素人が早死にを 志願したのなら なおさらだ

translation.en: I can't possibly justify more expense on another fruitless mission.
translation.ja: 無益な任務のために これ以上支出できない

translation.en: Minister, nobody wants to waste government funds.
We were rescued by a whaler.
Perhaps if we can put up a reward.

translation.ja: 置き去りなんて そうだが どうやって帰った？
そうだが どうやって帰った？

translation.en: They got picked up by a passing ship. The same will happen to us.
translation.ja: 通りかかった船に救われた 私たちもそうなる

translation.en: Imagine if they could see us now.
What would you do if a girl suddenly came walking towards us from across the ice?
translation.ja: 突然 氷の向こうから 女性が現れたらどうします？
サロモン･アンドレーか

translation.en: -Is that the guy that went missing? -Yeah. I met him once.
translation.ja: 行方不明の？ １度 会った

translation.en: I walked all the way from Copenhagen to Gothenburg to see him.
translation.ja: コペンハーゲンから イエーテボリまで歩いた

translation.en: He was gonna fly his hot-air balloon to the North Pole. I wanted to join his expedition.
translation.ja: 気球で北極探検に行く彼に 私も同行したかった

translation.en: [sarcastic] Bet he was thrilled to meet a 15-year-old you!
He explained to me that I was too young,
translation.ja: 若すぎると説得された

translation.en: but then he paid for me to catch the train back to Copenhagen.
translation.ja: コペンハーゲンまでの 交通費をくれた

translation.en: I guess, in a way, he saved my life.
translation.ja: ある意味 彼は私の命を救ってくれた

translation.en: To the cairn. To get the journals and the proof.
translation.ja: ケルンの日記と証拠を 取りに行く

translation.en: -We should never have left it. -Right now?
We need to get back here for when the sea opens up again.
translation.ja: 海氷が解ける前に戻らないと

translation.en: -Do you think we should leave a note? -No, Iver.
translation.ja: メモを残しては？ 必要ない

translation.en: As I told you, we'll be back before the ice breaks.
Yeah, but it's 200 miles there and 200 miles back.
translation.ja: でも320kmの道のりを 往復する

translation.en: For the love of God, can we just get going?
translation.ja: いいから早く出発するぞ

translation.en: They say there's truth in every dream.
Well, I hope for your sake there's no truth in my dreams.
translation.ja: 僕の夢が 事実でないことを願います

translation.en: I mean, I really couldn't go back.
translation.ja: このまま帰国できない

translation.en: Imagine arriving back in Copenhagen. "Oh, you're back!"
translation.ja: コペンハーゲンに戻って―

translation.en: "Oh, sorry, sir. It got eaten by a bear."
translation.ja: “クマに食べられた”とは 言えない

translation.en: What do you think did this?
They say there's truth in every dream, Iversen.
translation.ja: 夢には真実があるんだ

translation.en: They say there's truth in every dream.
Is that it, Captain? Is that…
Is that the car… from the Denmark Expedition?
translation.ja: あの車… デンマーク遠征の？
“アイナー･ミケルセンを 捜してる”

translation.en: I'm just saying it could've been worse. Could've been worse.
translation.ja: まだマシだ 最悪の事態もありえた

translation.en: I know what you want to say.
Yes, we should've left a fucking note!
translation.ja: そうだ メモを残すべきだった

translation.en: [Jørgensen] Minister, when the sailor found the hut, it was boarded up.
translation.ja: 船員が小屋を見つけた時 板張りがされてた 船員が小屋を見つけた時 板張りがされてた 〝追悼 アイナー･ ミケルセン〞

translation.en: We never left it like that. Someone's been there.
translation.ja: 私たちはしてない　誰かいる

translation.en: Do you mind if we walk and talk?
translation.ja: 続きは歩きながらでいい？
はい　忙しいでしょうから

translation.en: -I know you're a very busy man. -Busy?
translation.ja: はい　忙しいでしょうから 忙しい？

translation.en: Thank you. The whole nation seems to be rattling a begging bowl.
translation.ja: どうも 国全体が物乞いしてくる

translation.en: Then there's this Greenland issue where we have to convince our own people
translation.ja: グリーンランドが財政的に 維持可能な植民地だと

translation.en: that it's financially viable to maintain these wretched colonies,
translation.ja: グリーンランドが財政的に 維持可能な植民地だと 国民を説得しないと

translation.en: whilst trying to persuade the rest of the world that we still have some semblance of control.
translation.ja: 諸外国には統治可能だと 見せかけないといけない
ミケルセンの救助のことだが

translation.en: We appreciate and understand the importance of the work he undertook, of course.
translation.ja: 彼の功績については 感謝してる

translation.en: [chuckles] The Americans, they're desperate. Sticking their little flags in the ice all over the place
translation.ja: アメリカ人は必死で 氷の上に星条旗を掲げてる

translation.en: and this bloody Peary chap claiming the North Pole.
translation.ja: ピアリーは北極点到達を 主張してる

translation.en: We can't have that. It's ridiculous.
I'm confident that the captain secured the evidence.
translation.ja: 隊長は証拠を保全したはず

translation.en: But you don't know that, do you?
Nor do you know where in this vast country we should send a rescue mission.
translation.ja: 広大な土地の どこに救助隊を送る？

translation.en: -I know this is difficult for you to bear. -They won't survive another year.
translation.ja: つらいだろう あと１年はもたない

translation.en: If we don't get a ship there before the ice freezes next summer,
translation.ja: 海が凍る前に 船を送らなければ

translation.en: not only do we give up on them, but we also give up on Greenland.
translation.ja: 彼らもグリーンランドも 諦めることになる

translation.en: We have already offered a very generous reward.
translation.ja: 十分な報奨金を提供した

translation.en: More than that, I cannot do.
-But would you, Captain? -Honestly, Iver, I don't know.
translation.ja: どうです？ 分からない

translation.en: Actually, can we just leave it?
translation.ja: もうこの話はやめよう

translation.en: This is our first Christmas here, in the hut?
translation.ja: 小屋で初めての クリスマスだよな

translation.en: Yeah, second in the hut. Third in Greenland.
translation.ja: 小屋では２度目 グリーンランドでは３度目
メリークリスマス メリークリスマス

translation.en: I'll tell you something that I know for certain.
It's that whilst you still had your hands, I couldn't…
translation.ja: 僕の考えを話します 隊長に手や指があるうちは 無理です

translation.en: Or at the very least fingers.
translation.ja: 隊長に手や指があるうちは 無理です

translation.en: I don't like talking about it or thinking about it,
translation.ja: 話すのも考えるのも嫌だけど

translation.en: but for me, it's hands that distinguish humans from animals.
translation.ja: 人間と動物の違いは 手だと思います

translation.en: It's with our hands we can do all the things that animals can't do.
translation.ja: 人間と動物の違いは 手だと思います 人間は手があるから 動物にできないことができる

translation.en: So if my hands were removed before I die?
translation.ja: 私が死ぬ前に 手を失ってたら？

translation.en: Yeah, then… Yeah, I could quite happily eat you.
translation.ja: それなら喜んで 隊長を食べます

translation.en: I just missed you so much.
Captain, it's getting cold out here. Come back inside.
translation.ja: 寒くなってきた　中に入って

translation.en: The ice isn't completely impassable yet, is it?
translation.ja: 海は完全に 凍ってないですよね

translation.en: I think he's taken it hard.
translation.ja: かなり こたえてる

translation.en: We need to keep an eye on him,
make sure things don't get too much.
translation.ja: 深刻な事態にならぬよう

translation.en: Do you believe in ghosts, Captain?

translation.ja: 死んだ人が現れるとか？

translation.en: No. Just up on the hill.
Wh-what do you mean you met him?
translation.ja: 会ったとはどういうこと？

translation.en: You sensed him? You felt his presence?
translation.ja: 彼の存在を感じたのか？
違う　よく分からない

translation.en: I think he may have passed away whilst we've been here.
translation.ja: ここにいる間に 亡くなったのかも

translation.en: It doesn't necessarily mean he's dead.
I'm sorry. I'm… I'm really sorry.
translation.ja: 本当にすまない そんなつもりは…
本当にすまない そんなつもりは… いえ

translation.en: -If there's anything I can, you know-- -I know.
translation.ja: 私にできることが… 分かってます

translation.en: [Naja] What if you never come home?
-We were going to get married. -I didn't have an option.
translation.ja: 結婚してたはず 他に選択肢はなかった

translation.en: -I couldn't see another way. -Someone else could do this. Why you?
translation.ja: 他に選択肢はなかった 他の人がやればいい

translation.en: No one else could have done this.
I don't know why it had to be me, but it did. It was always going to be me.
translation.ja: なぜ私なのか説明できないが 仕方なかった

translation.en: What about Iver? Did he have a choice?
translation.ja: アイバーに選択肢はあった？

translation.en: He volunteered. He knew the dangers.
translation.ja: 危険を覚悟の上で志願した

translation.en: You do know that no one is coming to get you?
translation.ja: 助けは来ないと 知ってるわよね
何でもない　これがイラつく

translation.en: Get out. Get out! Get out!

translation.ja: やりますよ　動かないで

translation.en: Morning, Captain. You've been asleep for hours.
translation.ja: おはよう 隊長 何時間も寝てた

translation.en: How's the, um, neck holding up?
I almost feel guilty about it.
I know you picked her, but I guess last night, she decided to pick me,
translation.ja: 隊長が選んだ子ですが 昨夜は彼女が僕を選んだ

translation.en: if you know what I mean.
Did you see the tracks outside?
I'll go and have a look. Might be a rabbit or something.
translation.ja: 見てきます　ウサギかも
私は何も聞きたくない

translation.en: [Ejnar] You took her! You took her! You took her!

translation.ja: 隊長 やめてください
隊長 やめてください やめてください
私のだ 落ち着いて
落ち着いて これは現実ではない

translation.en: -Captain, put it down. -[Naja] Don't do this!
translation.ja: 銃を置いて やめて

translation.en: -Calm down. -[Naja] Don't do this. It's not real.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて 現実ではない

translation.en: -Don't do this! -[Iver] Put the gun down.

translation.ja: 銃を下ろせ　ダメだ
水に流しましょう　忘れて

translation.en: How much food do we have left?
One chance. One shot. Don't miss.
translation.ja: 弾は１発　必ず仕留めろ

translation.en: [Neergaard] What is the single most important task for an explorer?
translation.ja: 探検家にとって 最も重要な任務とは？

translation.en: When you travel into unknown lands to discover new parts of the globe,
translation.ja: 〝ミケルセンらを救助 証拠も保全〞 地球上の未知の土地を 探検する時は― 地球上の未知の土地を 探検する時は―

translation.en: it is to ensure the records of your discoveries
translation.ja: 発見したことの 確固たる証拠を

translation.en: are delivered back safe and sound,
translation.ja: 無事に届けることが 何より重要
自分の生死に関わらず

translation.en: Otherwise, it is all in vain.
translation.ja: そうでなければ すべてが無になる

translation.en: The blood, sweat and tears would all be for nothing.
translation.ja: 血も汗も涙も すべてが無駄になってしまう

translation.en: Unlike the honorable members of the Danish press,
translation.ja: デンマークの報道機関とは 異なり

translation.en: we in the Danish government never doubted for a second
translation.ja: 政府はずっと信じていた

translation.en: that Captain Mikkelsen would return home safe and sound.
translation.ja: ミケルセン隊長は 無事に帰還すると

translation.en: We played our part in ensuring the safe return of a Danish hero.
translation.ja: デンマークの英雄の帰還を 支援してきた

translation.en: You know that ship, the Titanic?
translation.ja: タイタニックという船を 知ってますか

translation.en: I wouldn't be standing here if it wasn't for you.
translation.ja: 君なしでは やれなかった

translation.en: "Based on the findings brought back by Captain Ejnar Mikkelsen,
translation.ja: ミケルセン隊長が 持ち帰った証拠により―
アメリカも認めるでしょう

translation.en: that Peary Land is not an island, but a part of Greenland."
translation.ja: ピアリーランドは島ではなく グリーンランドの一部だと

translation.en: -[Neergaard] It gives me great pleasure… -Congratulations, gentlemen.
translation.ja: 光栄なことに… おめでとう

translation.en: …to be the first person to welcome home the men who made the impossible possible.
translation.ja: 不可能を可能にした男性を ご紹介させていただきます
初めまして　お名前は？

translation.en: -It's a pleasure to meet you, Miss… -Holm.
translation.ja: 初めまして　お名前は？ ナヤ･ホルムよ

translation.en: It's a pleasure to meet you, Miss Holm.
translation.ja: お会いできて光栄です

translation.en: Captain Ejnar Mikkelsen and Iver Iversen.
translation.ja: アイナー･ミケルセン隊長と アイバー･アイバーソン

translation.en: [chuckles] They have returned, I promise you!

translation.ja: 大臣 アイバーです どうも
